title: yusrime
author: yusrime
content: How much you work for day? Are you working online or onsite,What are the methods you use for relaxing after doing your workload?

comments.author: geeyow
comments.body: Work:Â  9 - 5 (office)Method: Meditation (at least 5 minutes). I do it when I get home. Before doing anything else, I sit on my couch, no tv/phone, take a deep breath (hold as long as I can) then slowly exhale. 3 to 4 repetitions.Then comes the tea.

comments.author: Millenos
comments.body: I work 8 hours 5 days a week in a factory

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I like to watch sports, I enjoy a beer or ten. I like to spend time with my family & watch movies. I like to do stuff around the house. Thinking about it, there are so many things I enjoy & to be honest, working isnâ€™t one of them. Thatâ€™s probably the same for most people though. Who enjoys working, not me.The biggest stress release is just relaxing, there are so many things you can do to just switch off & forget about work & all the stresses that surround it.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: After a long workday, all I want to do is relax and let go of the pressure of my day. Trying to do this is very hard, knowing that I have responsibilities at home that I am expected to do while Iâ€™m still trying to let go of the day. Trying to schedule my downtime to disconnect from the world is a must. I take a candle lit bath, exercise out of the house so that I am not being cooped up indoors all day. Not relaxing can be physical and most of it does mess with the brain. Mental conditions can deteriorate and can be taxing to your future, so I recommend that to start off with.

comments.author: Zergal
comments.body: Gambling, sex and play video games.

comments.author: Phyna4
comments.body: Sleep, then I make sure i get a good cumðŸ¤£, very good for the body.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: i usually watch a movie, or will go straight to bed.

comments.author: Ayannare
comments.body: 12 hours... I like a warm bath after work, it's relaxing

comments.author: Uruhara
comments.body: I prefer to enjoy my free time to relax in the living room. watching a movie and while exploring some social media and sometimes I enter this forum to reply to some topics that I think are interesting and match what I'm looking for.i also do crypto trading in my spare time. like after finishing work.

comments.author: Chinedu kalu
comments.body: After I get home from work, I have my dinner then lie down with a cool music......check my mails and inbox from there I go to sleep

comments.author: Fretum
comments.body: I work 4 or 5, sometimes longer. Always sit at the PC and have to work online. Some things are monotonous, for some things you have to be able to put more into it.My compensation is sports. I do sports every day. Either I go running or I go to the gym. It helps me a lot to recharge my batteries.

comments.author: Wolfblood200$
comments.body: My best advice would be to listen or watch a comedy show or movieÂ  , it takes your mind off the stress and stress is a thing of the mind, Medically it is said that having sex with your spouse can help to reduce stress,Â  perhaps you might want to try that too, Thanks

comments.author: Lyna Sam
comments.body: I usually play casino games on my phone just for fun to release my stress. Until haven't play casino game that involved real money.

comments.author: Kenny Tan
comments.body: Well I do that same but it's the actual online casino. Man it's fun and I can see pretty girls dealing during my game.

comments.author: Lyna Sam
comments.body: Yo tell me what online casino is it? I also wanna try. I might lose or win money but must be fun

comments.author: Kenny Tan
comments.body: It's called BK8. You can play the slots, roulette, blackjack, craps and more. All the games has live deals. It' super fun to play. Relax stress like crazy

comments.author: Lyna Sam
comments.body: Good game good life. Btw thanks for sharing

comments.author: Baseeman
comments.body: A warm bath and a good night's sleep
